content: Career Asked by AnonymousAsked on 22 Jun 2019Is trading forex and earning money from it considered as illegal when serving NS? Thanks for the replies in advance!?I will be enlisting in army soon and I am planning on trading forex. Is it considered moonlighting and illegal?1 answerAnswerBump2
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent
Zen Rogue XuanLevel 5. GeniusAnswered on 27 Jun 2019No. Moonlighting is only if you serve in the capacity of an employer. Forex trading is not considered employment.0 comments1
